usersProjects_table¶

class tracktor_server.usersProjects_table.UsersProjects(db_name)¶

Bases: object

Class to manage connection to the backend usersProjects table.

This class provides methods to to write/read from a SQLite database directly, while main.py handles the requests and calls on these functions.

db_name¶

The name of the SQLite database file.

Type:

str

connection¶

The database connection.

Type:

sqlite3.Connection or None

add_assignment(user_id, project_id, role)¶

Add a connection from a user_id to the project_id.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user.

  • project_id (int) – The ID of the project.

  • role (str) – The role of the user in the project.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created assignment.

Return type:

int

get_all_assignments()¶

Get all user-project assignments

Returns:

A list of all user-project assignment rows.

Return type:

list[sqlite3.Row]

get_assignments(user_id)¶

Get all project_ids, connected to a specific user_id.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – The ID of the user.

Returns:

A list of project IDs for the user.

Return type:

list[sqlite3.Row]

get_db()¶

Opens the named database or creates one if it doesn’t exist.

Returns:

The db connection object.

Return type:

sqlite3.Connection

init_usersProjects_table()¶

Creates and SQL table for users if it doesn’t already exist.
